TEXT.TITLE: SAUDI SUPERTANKER REPORTED HIT BY IRAN OFF UAE
TEXT.BODY: Iran attacked the Saudi Arabian supertanker Arabian Sea off the United Arab Emirates last night but the vessel was able to proceed after the incident, Lloyds Shipping Intelligence reported. The 315,695-dwt Arabian Sea had set sail on Tuesday after loading oil at the Saudi port of Ras Tannurah. Lloyds said the attack occurred at about 2200 hrs local time (1800 GMT). Reuter
